name: ILIFERobot
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ILIFE ROBOT SKILL now supports A7 and A9.
We will try to enable more robots to be compatible with Alexa in the future.
You can control your vacuum by your voice. To get started make sure you have downloaded the ILIFE App and your ILIFE robot has connected and online. Then, follow the step Alexa app show to enable the skill and link the ILIFE App account.

After successful connection, please try to say:

Alexa, turn on Zaco.
Alexa, turn off Zaco.
